function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of willingness to use technology for COVID-19 prevention","Impact":"Ineffective use of disease surveillance and prevention tools","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to promote technology usage","Technologies":"Smart thermometers, smart wearables, telemedicine platforms, contact-tracing apps","People":"General population","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate disease surveillance and forecasting","Impact":"Delayed response to an impending outbreak","Mitigation":"Investment in AI for disease surveillance, early detection systems","Technologies":"Artificial intelligence for disease surveillance","People":"Public health organizations, governments","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of collective action to combat COVID-19","Impact":"Prolonged pandemic and disruption of normalcy","Mitigation":"Collaboration between governments and people","Technologies":"AI for pandemic management, early detection systems","People":"General population","Owner":"Governments, public health organizations"}]}
